cases.title: Uniform background color
cases.notes: Text "Baseline" on white background.

cases.title: Uniform background color - light gray text
cases.notes: Text "Low contrast" on white background.

cases.title: Uniform dark background color (viewport background)
cases.notes: Text "Baseline" on dark background; the background is set on the viewport element.

cases.title: Uniform dark background color
cases.notes: Text "Baseline" on dark background.

cases.title: Alpha text - 50%
cases.notes: Text "Alpha 50%" uses opacity on dark background. The rendered text color depends on alpha blending.

cases.title: Alpha text - 25%
cases.notes: Text "Alpha 25%" uses opacity on dark background. The rendered text color depends on alpha blending.

cases.title: Near threshold (4.5:1)
cases.notes: Text on white background with contrast just above AA (4.51:1, rounded). Near the threshold, results may differ slightly due to rounding/precision choices.

cases.title: Below threshold (4.5:1)
cases.notes: Text on white background with contrast just below AA (4.49:1, rounded). Near the threshold, results may differ slightly due to rounding/precision choices.

cases.title: Large text - near threshold (3:1)
cases.notes: Large text on white background with contrast just above 3:1 (3.01:1, rounded). Near the threshold, results may differ slightly due to rounding/precision choices.

cases.title: Large text - below threshold (3:1)
cases.notes: Large text on white background with contrast just below 3:1 (2.99:1, rounded). Near the threshold, results may differ slightly due to rounding/precision choices.

cases.title: Normal text
cases.notes: Text "Normal text" on white background.

cases.title: Normal text - low contrast
cases.notes: Text "Normal text" on white background with low contrast.

cases.title: Declared background - white
cases.notes: Text "Declared" on declared white background.

cases.title: Declared background white - covered by image
cases.notes: Text "Covered" over a background image; the viewport also declares white underneath. Some checkers may use the declared background instead of the image.

cases.title: Declared background black - covered by image
cases.notes: Text "Covered" over a background image; the viewport also declares black underneath. Some checkers may use the declared background instead of the image.

cases.title: Declared background - gradient overlay
cases.notes: Text "Covered" over a background image with a translucent gradient overlay; black is declared underneath. Correct evaluation requires compositing multiple layers.

cases.title: Declared background black - covered by image (light blue text)
cases.notes: Light-blue text "Covered" over a background image; black is declared underneath. Some checkers may use the declared background instead of the image.

cases.title: Declared background white - covered by image (light blue text)
cases.notes: Light-blue text "Covered" over a background image; white is declared underneath. Some checkers may use the declared background instead of the image.

cases.title: Tiny text
cases.notes: Button label "Tiny text" (11px) on a white button over white background.

cases.title: Thin weight
cases.notes: Button label "Thin weight" on a white button over white background.

cases.title: Parent opacity
cases.notes: Text "Opacity" inside a parent element with reduced opacity on white background. Parent opacity changes the rendered foreground color.

cases.title: RGBA text - 40%
cases.notes: Text "RGBA" uses transparency on white background. The rendered text color depends on alpha blending.

cases.title: Text shadow
cases.notes: Text "Shadow" on white background with a text shadow. Some checkers ignore shadows and evaluate only the text color.

cases.title: Text shadow (strong)
cases.notes: Text "Shadow" on white background with a strong blurred shadow. Some checkers ignore shadows and evaluate only the text color.

cases.title: Placeholder - low contrast
cases.notes: Placeholder "Type here..." in a text input on white background with low contrast.

cases.title: Placeholder - high contrast
cases.notes: Placeholder "Type here..." in a text input on white background.

cases.title: Floating label
cases.notes: Floating label "Email" above a text input on white background.

cases.title: Floating label - value low contrast
cases.notes: Floating label is readable, but the input value has low contrast on the input background. Tools may report one and miss the other.

cases.title: Floating label - low label contrast
cases.notes: Floating label has low contrast on white background, while the input value is readable. Tools may report one and miss the other.

cases.title: Floating label - highlighted value low contrast
cases.notes: Floating label ("Email") is shown with sufficient contrast, but the input value ("name@example.com") is rendered as dark text on a dark blue highlight, resulting in low contrast.

cases.title: Disabled text - low contrast
cases.notes: Disabled setting row shows "Disabled label" and "OFF" with low contrast on the component background.

cases.title: Helper text - low contrast
cases.notes: Label "Email" plus helper text "Weâ€™ll never share it." The helper line has low contrast. Tools may report one and miss the other.

cases.title: Link - high contrast
cases.notes: Link text "Link" on white background.

cases.title: Link - low contrast
cases.notes: Link text "Link" on white background with low contrast.

cases.title: Button - high contrast
cases.notes: Button label "Button" on a blue button over white background.

cases.title: Button - low contrast
cases.notes: Button label "Button" on a blue button with low contrast.

cases.title: Badge - low contrast
cases.notes: Badge label "Badge" on yellow background with low contrast.

cases.title: Badge - high contrast
cases.notes: Badge label "Badge" on yellow background.

cases.title: Gradient - low contrast
cases.notes: Light gray text ("Gradient") is shown directly on a non-uniform background with a left-to-right light gradient (no images, no transparency).

cases.title: Gradient text - background-clip
cases.notes: Text "Gradient" rendered via background-clip:text with color: transparent on white background, so the text fill comes from a linear gradient. Some checkers may not compute the rendered fill correctly.

cases.title: Radial - low contrast
cases.notes: Text "Radial" on a radial gradient background. Contrast varies across the text area.

cases.title: Multi-stop - low contrast
cases.notes: Text "Multi-stop" on a multi-stop gradient background. Contrast varies across the text area.

cases.title: Repeating - low contrast
cases.notes: Text "Repeating" on a repeating pattern background. Sampling a single point can be misleading.

cases.title: Checker - low contrast
cases.notes: Text "Checker" on a checkerboard pattern background. Sampling a single point can be misleading.

cases.title: Gradient - text on pill
cases.notes: Text "Pill" inside a pill element on top of a gradient background. Tools may sample the wrong layer.

cases.title: Pseudo background - ::before
cases.notes: Text "::before" over a background drawn by a ::before pseudo-element. Tools that ignore pseudo-elements may compute the wrong background.

cases.title: Overlay panel - low contrast
cases.notes: Dark text "Overlay" on a light translucent panel over a darker background. Correct evaluation requires alpha compositing.

cases.title: Overlay panel - high contrast
cases.notes: White text "Overlay" on a light translucent panel over a darker background. Correct evaluation requires alpha compositing.

cases.title: Filter - brightness trap
cases.notes: Text is shown on a panel whose background is altered by a CSS brightness filter, while the text color stays the same. Some checkers may ignore CSS filters and compute contrast from the original colors.

cases.title: Backdrop-filter - blur and brightness
cases.notes: Text is shown on a translucent panel with backdrop-filter over a dark gradient. Some checkers may not compute the filtered/composited background correctly.

cases.title: Mask-image - text
cases.notes: A CSS mask fades parts of the glyphs to transparent. Reported results depend on mask support and sampling.

cases.title: Color-mix - low contrast
cases.notes: Text color is computed with color-mix using transparency on white background. Some checkers may not support color-mix and may compute a different final color.

cases.title: Image background - nested element
cases.notes: The viewport background is white, but the text sits inside a nested element with its own dark gradient background. Some checkers may sample the viewport background instead of the nested background.

cases.title: Animated gradient background
cases.notes: Text is shown on an animated gradient background. Some checkers may sample a single animation frame and report different results.

cases.title: SVG text element
cases.notes: Text is rendered as SVG text rather than HTML text. Some checkers may handle SVG text differently or skip it.

cases.title: Sibling background - case 1
cases.notes: A sibling layer behind the text provides the effective background. Some checkers may sample the viewport background instead of the sibling layer.

cases.title: Sibling background - case 2
cases.notes: A sibling layer behind the text paints a different background than the viewport. Some checkers may sample the viewport background instead of the sibling layer.

cases.title: Pseudo overlay - light
cases.notes: A ::before overlay blends over the background under the text. Tools that ignore pseudo-elements may compute the wrong background.

cases.title: Pseudo overlay - strong
cases.notes: A stronger ::before overlay changes the background under the text. Contrast must be computed on the blended result.

cases.title: Mix blend mode - gradient
cases.notes: Text uses mix-blend-mode: difference over a gradient. The rendered text color depends on pixels behind it and may not be computed by some tools.

cases.title: F24 failure background set but text color not set
cases.notes: WCAG Failure F24: background color is set but text color is not explicitly set. Contrast depends on inherited/UA defaults and is not guaranteed.

cases.title: Image of text banner not DOM text
cases.notes: Text is part of an image (not real DOM text). DOM/CSS-based tools may miss it.
